about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: This blog is an open record of my perspective.

historyAndTruth.title: History and Truth
historyAndTruth.p1: History doesn't show us the complete truth. It gives us only a partial view of events. What really happened and what was false is impossible to know with absolute certainty.
historyAndTruth.p2: But one thing is clear - whatever happened, happened in reality. Those events were real. People experienced them. Decisions were made. Consequences were faced.
historyAndTruth.p3: My work is to see those events through my lens. I don't claim any ultimate truth. I simply share my perspective.

whyIWrite.title: Why I Write
whyIWrite.intro:
Every person sees the world differently. Our background, experience, and values shape our understanding.

I write on this blog because:
whyIWrite.reason1: First, I believe it's important to hear different perspectives. When we look at the same event from multiple angles, we develop a deeper understanding.
whyIWrite.reason2: Second, writing is a thinking process for me. When I write, I force myself to be clear. I give structure to my thoughts.
whyIWrite.reason3: Third, I want dialogue. I see this blog as a conversation. You read, you think, and perhaps you disagree. That's a good thing.

myApproach.title: My Approach
myApproach.intro: I write in three main areas:
myApproach.history: History - Attempting to understand past events in present context. History is not a collection of dead facts. It's a study of patterns, motivations, and human nature.
myApproach.technology: Technology - How technology is shaping our lives, society, and future. Both its possibilities and its dangers.
myApproach.politics: Politics - Analysis of current events. Power, decisions, and their impact. I don't promote any ideology, I simply observe and analyze.
